TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SrgsDocument extends System.Object

summary.span: Defines a design-time object that is used to build strongly-typed runtime grammars that conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

span.span: Defines a design-time object that is used to build strongly-typed runtime grammars that conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以建構空執行個體，並將加入的類別，代表 SRGS 項目，例如執行個體建置文法， ，， ， ，和。You can you construct an empty instance and build a grammar by adding instances of classes that represent SRGS elements, such as , ,, , , and . 您也可以建構從現有的 SRGS 相容的 XML 文法檔案，從執行個體的執行個體，或從執行個體。You can also construct an instance from an existing SRGS-compliant XML grammar file, from an instance of , or from an instance of . 之後建立物件時，可以載入至物件，或由編譯，讓它所讀取物件。After the object is created, it can be loaded into a object or compiled by , enabling it to be read by a object. 請參閱[建立文法使用 SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906)中[System 語音程式設計指南 》 的.NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043)如需詳細資訊和範例。See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Windows 和 System.Speech API 接受所有有效國家 （地區） 語言代碼。Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes. 若要執行使用中所指定語言的語音辨識屬性，語音辨識引擎支援，必須安裝語言國家/地區的程式碼。To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the property, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed. 隨附於 Microsoft Windows 7 的語音辨識引擎會使用下列語言的國家/地區碼。The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes. - en GB。en-GB. 英文 （英國）English (United Kingdom) - EN-US。en-US. 英文 （美國）English (United States) - 為 DE-DE。de-DE. 德文 （德國）German (Germany) - es ES。es-ES. 西班牙文 （西班牙）Spanish (Spain) - fr-fr。fr-FR. 法文 （法國）French (France) - 若為 JA-JP。ja-JP. 日文 （日本）Japanese (Japan) - zh-chs 和 CN。zh-CN. 中文 （中國）Chinese (China) - zh-chs 和 TW。zh-TW. 中文 （台灣）Chinese (Taiwan) 兩個字母的語言代碼，例如"en"，"fr"，或也允許"es"。Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.

exception.span: The value being assigned to is .

The recognition mode of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性傳回的成員可決定的輸入類型，預期。The property returns a member of the that determines the type of input that the expects. 兩個可能的值為`Voice`語音輸入和`Dtmf`雙重撥號音後開始 (dtmf) 色調，通常與電話相關聯的輸入。The two possible values are `Voice` for speech input, and `Dtmf` for input of dual-tone multi-frequency (DTMF) tones that are commonly associated with a telephone.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Speech::Recognition::SrgsGrammar::SrgsPhoneticAlphabet PhoneticAlphabet { System::Speech::Recognition::SrgsGrammar::SrgsPhoneticAlphabet get(); void set(System::Speech::Recognition::SrgsGrammar::SrgsPhoneticAlphabet value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the phonetic alphabet of the class.

span.span: Gets or sets the phonetic alphabet of the class.

value.span: 傳回必須用來指定自訂發音中的語音字母物件。

span.span: Returns the phonetic alphabet that must be used to specify custom pronunciations in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 注音字母所組成包含字母、 數字或字元，有時在組合中的電話。Phonetic alphabets are composed of phones, which consist of letters, numbers or characters, sometimes in combination. 每個電話描述語音唯一音效。Each phone describes a unique sound of speech. 這是相較於拉丁字母，任何字母可能代表多個口語的音效。This is in contrast to the Latin alphabet, for which any letter may represent multiple spoken sounds. 請考慮不同的發音的字母"c"中的文字 「 指標 」 和 「 停止 」 或不同的發音字母組合的"th"單字 「 動作 」 以及 「 」 中。Consider the different pronunciations of the letter "c" in the words "candy" and "cease", or the different pronunciations of the letter combination "th" in the words "thing" and "those". System.Speech，在您可以使用來指定自訂的發音任何三個注音字母： 國際電話字母 (IPA)、 通用電話設定 (UPS) 或 SAPI 電話設定。In System.Speech, you can use any of three phonetic alphabets to specify custom pronunciations: International Phone Alphabet (IPA), Universal Phone Set (UPS), or the SAPI phone set. 指定的語音字母決定哪個電話集將會用來定義內嵌文字的發音物件。The specified phonetic alphabet determines which phone set will be used to define inline pronunciations for objects. 中指定的電話必須符合在指定的語音字母。The phones specified in must match the phonetic alphabet specified in . 請參閱[lexicon 除外和注音字母](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51)如需詳細資訊。See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.

summary.span: Gets or sets the base URI of the class.

span.span: Gets or sets the base URI of the class.
The current base URI of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得值，用來解析相對 Uri 中的物件。 property gets a value that is used to resolve relative URIs in a object. 假設的值是"http://www.contoso.com/"和包含相對規則參考到另一個文件，例如`SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`。Suppose the value for is "http://www.contoso.com/" and the contains a relative rule reference to another document, for example `SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`. 這會建立外部文件的下列絕對路徑： `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`。This creates the following absolute path to the external document: `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`.
